author: Staff Reporter
text:
Rajendran of Moongilpadi in Omalur taluk (43), a labourer, who was undergoing treatment at Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital after assaulted by his brother died at the hospital here on Monday night.

According to police, dispute broke between Rajendran and his elder brother Selvam (55) over drinking water pipeline. On Sunday night, quarrel broke between them and Selvam and his son Senthil (33) attacked Rajendran with sickle. Rajendran suffered serious injuries and was admitted to the hospital.

Suramangalam police registered a case. The police arrested Selvam and Senthil and produced them in the court and lodged them at Salem Central Prison.
title: Labourer succumbs to injuries
